Package Client.Network

Class Network

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Client.Network.Network
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteClient, Scout, GameCommand, LobbyInterface, Serializable, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientRMI, ClientSocket
public abstract class Network extends UnicastRemoteObject implements GameCommand, LobbyInterface, RemoteClient, Scout
The Network class is an abstract class that represents a network connection for a client application. It extends the UnicastRemoteObject class and implements various interfaces related to game commands, lobby interface, remote client, and scout. It provides methods for initializing the network connection, starting ping/pong communication, updating objects, and handling timeouts.

    • pong

      public void pong(String playerID, String lobbyID) throws RemoteException
      Receives a pong message from the server to confirm the connection. Cancels the timer for timeout and schedules a new ping request.
      Specified by:
      pong in interface RemoteClient
